articles.description: “I love playing football and while I feel like I’m in good shape and enjoying this, I’m going to keep at it," says Messi.
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES: After hoisting his first World Cup trophy with Argentina in December, Lionel Messi said that tournament would be his last, but now it appears hes open to the possibility of playing in t… [+1054 chars]
